allow: Bash(python3 -c "from dataclasses import asdict; from src.das_bridge.domain.positions import Position; import inspect; print\(inspect.getmembers\(Position, predicate=inspect.ismethod\)\); print\(''\\n---\\n''\); print\(asdict.__doc__\)")
